mapper.select: SELECT h.hotelNum , h.hotelName , h.hotelAddress , h.hotelRating , h.hotelGrade , h.latitude , h.longitude , h.breakfastPrice , r.roomNum , r.roomPrice , r.roomName , r.capacity , r.roomInfo FROM room r JOIN hotel h ON r.hotelNum = h.hotelNum WHERE r.hotelNum = #{ hotelNum } AND r.capacity >= #{ guestCount } AND r.roomNum NOT IN( SELECT r2.roomNum FROM reservation res JOIN room r2 ON res.roomNum = r2.roomNum WHERE r2.hotelNum = #{ hotelNum } AND TO_DATE(#{checkIn}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < res.checkOut AND TO_DATE(#{checkOut}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > res.checkIn ) ORDER BY r.roomNum ASC
SELECT roomNum, roomPrice, roomName, capacity, roomInfo FROM room WHERE roomNum = #{roomNum}
